kreport.name: feedbackQuery

data.tbody: ${0} ${1} ${2} ${3} ${4} ${5} ${6}

kreport.ksql: --工单反馈信息查询 select f.serialno 工单编号, (select decode(b.status,'0','跟踪','1','自动取消','2','手动取消','') from rec_flow_behindtrack b where b.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and b.begintime=f.blast) 跟踪状态, to_char(f.blast,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') 跟踪发起时间, (select b.trackpresonname from rec_flow_behindtrack b where b.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and b.begintime=f.blast) 跟踪发起人, f.mnum 反馈次数, m.content 最后反馈信息 from ( select f.flowlsh,f.serialno,count(b.id) bnum,max(b.begintime) blast,count(m.id) mnum,max(m.feedback_time) mlast from ( select f.flowlsh,f.serialno,count(m.id) mnum from rec_flow f,int_feedback_message m,rec_flow_behindtrack b where f.flowlsh=m.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=b.flowlsh(+) #[and f.serialno like ${serialno}] #[exists( select 1 from rec_node n where n.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and n.status in ('DT','DB','SF') and n.executergrouporgname like ${orgname} ) ] #[and b.begintime>=${startbegintime}] #[and b.begintime<${endbegintime}] #[and b.trackpresonname like ${trackpresonname}] #[and m.feedback_time>=${startfeedbacktime}] #[and m.feedback_time<${endfeedbacktime}] group by f.flowlsh,f.serialno ) f, int_feedback_message m,rec_flow_behindtrack b where f.flowlsh=m.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=b.flowlsh(+) group by f.flowlsh,f.serialno ) f,int_feedback_message m where f.flowlsh=m.flowlsh and f.mlast=m.feedback_time
